medical_history.chief_complaint: Suprapubic pain with associated nausea and anorexia.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 2 days prior, initially periumbilical pain that progressed to suprapubic pain with mild right-sided tendency. The symptoms were associated with nausea and anorexia.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Denies personal or family history of inflammatory bowel disease or colorectal cancer. Denies prior colonoscopy. Previous surgery includes arthroscopic left hip surgery.
medical_history.family_history: No inflammatory bowel disease, no colorectal cancer.
